Description:
Primary Duties and Responsibilities Responsible for overseeing Completions activities to ensure EPC Contractor delivery of all aspects of Completions Management System and execution of systems completions including Construction, pre-commissioning, and commissioning activities. 
Ensures EPC database set-up with systemization, punch-list clearing, check sheets A, B and C, and coordination with other stakeholder disciplines to develop the completions database.
Provides clear guidance to the EPC contractor and facilitates resolution of completions issues to meet Project objectives and milestones.
Provides clear guidance to the PMT pe and facilitates resolution of completions issues to meet Project objectives and milestones.
Proficient in Database software programs, WIN-PCS, Go-Completions, etc. Experience with Handover control system is desirable.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor Degree in Engineering or equivalent.10 yearsâ€™ experience as a Completions Coordinator with a broad knowledge of Completions and Handovers processes.
Experience in systemization, completions database development, Completions check sheets, punch listing, handover dossiers Pre-commissioning, Commissioning and Startup of Brown-field onshore LPG/Condensate storage and transport facilities experience as in the Common Liquified Petroleum Gas (CLPG) and Common Condensate Storage and Loading (CCSL) is desirable.
